data.comment: The match is underway. Nacional have kicked-off.
Throw-in Nacional.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Nacional in the half of Maritimo.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Maritimo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 7, Nacional have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Maritimo's Jorge Correa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nacional defender.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Nacional throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Free kick Maritimo.
In the minute 12, Larry Azouni for Nacional has been booked by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira and receives a first yellow card.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Nacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Nacional.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
In the minute 17, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a throw-in for Maritimo, close to Nacional's area.
Maritimo surge into the attack at Estadio do Maritimo but Jean Cleberâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Nacional drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Nacional.
Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio do Maritimo.
Free kick for Maritimo in the half of Nacional.
In the minute 21, At Estadio do Maritimo, Vincent Thill has been yellow-carded for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 24, Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Maritimo's Zainadine Junior has been booked in Funchal.
In the minute 26, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Daniel Guimaraes.
Daniel Guimaraes returns to the field for Nacional after picking up a slight injury.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Abdullahi Ibrahim Alhassan (Nacional) has received a yellow card from Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In the minute 30, In Funchal, Maritimo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 32, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Nacional.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Maritimo throw-in in Nacional's half.
Pedro Pelagio of Maritimo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 35, Maritimo's Joel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Nacional a goal kick.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 36, Maritimo to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
Nacional have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick Maritimo.
Brayan Riascos gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nacional.
Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio do Maritimo.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Nacional close to the penalty box.
Nacional push forward at Estadio do Maritimo and Larry Azouni gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Maritimo defence.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Nacional in the half of Maritimo.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Nacional.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Nacional in the half of Maritimo.
Nacional's Joao Camacho is on target but unsuccessful.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Nacional have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Maritimo kick-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Nacional.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Nacional.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Maritimo in the half of Nacional.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
Nacional drive upfield and Joao Camacho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Maritimo defender.
In the minute 51, Nacional's Vincent Thill breaks free at Estadio do Maritimo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Nacional to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Free kick Maritimo.
In the minute 55, Maritimo's Rodrigo Pinho gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maritimo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Important block from the Nacional defence as Fabio China fires in a strike for Maritimo.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Nacional.
Francois Xavier Fumu Tamuzo is on a sub for Jorge Correa for Maritimo.
Throw-in Maritimo.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
At Estadio do Maritimo, Maritimo are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Maritimo in Funchal.
In the minute 61, In Funchal Maritimo attack through Claudio Winck. The finish is off target, however.
Nacional have a goal kick.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, The away team replace Vincent Thill with Kenji Gorre.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Nacional.
Nacional needs to be cautious. Maritimo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 64, Maritimo are coming forward and Claudio Winck gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 66, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Maritimo throw-in in Nacional's half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Funchal, Rodrigo Pinho of Maritimo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 68, Important block from the Nacional defence as Fabio China fires in a strike for Maritimo.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Nacional have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Nacional.
Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Can Nacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Maritimo's half?
In the minute 77, Free kick for Nacional in the half of Maritimo.
The home team have replaced Jean Cleber with Rene. This is the second substitution made today by Lito Vidigal.
Abdullahi Ibrahim Alhassan for Nacional drives towards goal at Estadio do Maritimo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Maritimo make their third substitution with Ali Alipour replacing Joel.
Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Nacional close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Maritimo in Funchal.
In the minute 84, Maritimo pushes forward through Francois Xavier Fumu Tamuzo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Nacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bryan Rochez is replacing Ruben Micael for the away team.
In the minute 85, Nuno Borges is replacing Brayan Riascos for the away team.
Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In Funchal, Franck Bambock of Maritimo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 86, Rene (Maritimo) strikes at Estadio do Maritimo but his header is cleared.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nacional's Kenji Gorre misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio do Maritimo.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Nacional are pushing forward but Nuno Borges's finish is wide of the goal.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Maritimo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Nacional.
Rodrigo Pinho for Maritimo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Maritimo throw-in in Nacional's half.
That's full-time at Estadio do Maritimo. The final score is 0-0.
